channel.title: BLE on InPlay Doc
channel.description: Recent content in BLE on InPlay Doc

item.title: BLE5.0 AT Command Set
item.description: Inplay BLE 5.0 AT Command Set # INTRODUCTION # Inplay IN6xx BLE module is a standard Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) 5.0 certified RF module. It introduces a private service as interface of data streaming between two BLE devices transparently. IN6xx BLE module provides the control interface based on ASCII commands, say AT commands. They are used to configure parameters, retrieve module state, control actions of module, etc. All configuration changes can be optionally remained in Non-Volatile Memory (Flash) and survive the following power cycle.
